name: Space War (itch) (iamAlphaDev)
description:
The only objetive is to get the highest score!

A simple ship game, good luck if you want to play, it's my "first game" :D, well ... It really is more for practice :). 

This is going to have some updates and it's  repetitive, there are only 3 enemies, but if you want you can try to get the highest score you can.

Warning: Actually, the game should not be played for more than 10 minutes. After 10 minutes it's gets a little bored :(, because it has an only level

Enemies stats: 

Small: 3 life, 2 speed

Medium: 2 life, 3.5 speed

Big: 20 life, 0.5 speed (But he can shoot)

Credits:

All sprites from: https://ansimuz.itch.io/spaceship-shooter-environment

All sounds effects from: https://gamesupply.itch.io/300-futuristic-sfx-with-names

The music is from: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
